item.title: Warren Buffett officially retires as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO
item.description: The legendary 95-year-old investor spent decades building his company into one of the world's largest and most powerful. Now Greg Abel is taking it over.

item.title: The state of the U.S. economy as 2025 draws to a close
item.description: The U.S. economy chugs into the new year in stronger shape than many forecasters had expected. But Americans remain wary about the high cost of living.

item.title: What is a K-shaped economy?
item.description: In 2025, one of the biggest business buzzwords has been the idea of a "K-shaped" economy, in which there is a growing disparity between the rich and the poor.

item.title: Clean energy is surging despite political attacks. But a slowdown may be looming
item.description: The U.S. is forecast to add a lot less power from renewables than analysts previously expected. The potential slowdown comes as electricity demand is rising faster than it has in decades.
